description: Brought my 2024 Toyota Camry in for a rattling noise from the dashboard. Visited twice but the issue was not resolved. Have been waiting three weeks for a follow-up appointment with a senior technician.
resolution: Escalated to senior technician. Third appointment scheduled for January 28, 2025.

description: Was promised a spray-in bedliner as part of the deal on my 2023 Ford F-150 but it was not installed before delivery. Have been waiting two weeks for a callback from the sales team.
resolution: Sales manager contacted customer and scheduled bedliner installation. Completed January 18, 2025. Customer satisfied.

description: The final APR on my loan for the 2023 BMW 330i is 5.9%, but I was quoted 4.5% during negotiations. I have the original quote sheet showing the lower rate. Requesting a rate adjustment.
resolution: Finance director reviewing original paperwork. Lender contacted to request rate correction.

description: Infotainment system on my new 2024 Hyundai Tucson freezes intermittently and requires a full restart. Has happened four times in the first month. Requesting a replacement unit under warranty.
resolution: Warranty claim submitted to Hyundai. Awaiting replacement part shipment. Expected arrival February 5, 2025.

description: Found a small rust spot on the undercarriage of my 2022 Toyota RAV4 Hybrid that should have been caught during the CPO inspection. Questioning the thoroughness of the inspection process.
resolution: Rust spot treated and undercoated at no charge. Full secondary inspection performed. Customer accepted resolution.

description: My 2024 Chevrolet Equinox was delivered with 340 miles on the odometer instead of the advertised 10 miles. Concerned the car may have been used as a demo without disclosure.
resolution: Investigating mileage discrepancy with inventory team. Offered $500 credit for mileage difference. Awaiting customer response.

description: Trade-in value offered for my 2020 Honda Accord was $18,000, which is $3,000 below KBB fair market value. Requesting a re-evaluation.
resolution: Vehicle re-appraised at $19,500. Customer accepted revised trade-in offer and completed purchase.

description: The online inventory shows vehicles as available that are already sold. I drove 45 minutes to the dealership only to find the 2024 Kia Sportage I wanted was already sold.
resolution: IT team notified to audit inventory sync between website and dealer management system. Offered customer priority notification for similar vehicles.

description: Dropped off my 2023 Ford F-150 for a routine oil change at 8:00 AM. Was told it would be ready by noon but did not receive my vehicle back until 4:30 PM. No communication about the delay.
resolution: Service manager apologized and provided a complimentary oil change voucher for next visit. Reviewing workflow scheduling.

description: Received my first loan statement and the monthly payment is $45 higher than what was discussed during financing. The terms on my contract do not match what I was told verbally.
resolution: Finance team reviewing deal jacket. Comparing signed documents to customer's account of the discussion.

description: Noticed uneven paint on the rear bumper of my new 2024 Honda CR-V within the first week. Appears to have been repainted or touched up. Requesting an explanation and correction.
resolution: Body shop inspection confirmed minor touch-up from transport damage. Bumper repainted to factory standards at no cost. Customer satisfied.

description: Called three times over two days to check on the status of my ordered 2024 Toyota Tacoma and was transferred to voicemail each time. No one returned my calls.
resolution: Sales manager assigned a dedicated point of contact for the customer. Vehicle order status update provided.

description: Brought my 2024 Jeep Wrangler 4xe in for a charging system warning light. Was told the diagnostic would take one day but the vehicle has been in the shop for five days with no update.
resolution: Parts on backorder from Jeep. Service advisor instructed to provide daily updates. Loaner vehicle offered.

description: Felt pressured by the sales associate to purchase an extended warranty and additional protection packages. The hard sell made the buying experience uncomfortable.
resolution: Sales manager spoke with customer and apologized. Unwanted add-ons removed from the deal. Sales team coached on consultative selling approach.

description: Was charged a $495 documentation fee that was not mentioned during price negotiations for my 2024 Subaru Crosstrek. Requesting a refund of this undisclosed fee.
resolution: Finance manager reviewing. Documentation fee is standard but should have been disclosed upfront. Considering goodwill refund.
